content: Jet lag is no joke! Tried sketching at 3 AM, but sleep won. Did manage to plan a family art trip in NYC though. Who knew my sleep-deprived brain could be so productive?
raw_content: "Jet lag from Japan to NYC is real! I tried setting up my art supplies at 3 AM, thinking it was the perfect time to sketch. Spoiler: it wasn't. But hey, I did manage to organize a family reunion trip to explore NYC's art scene together. Who knew my sleep-deprived brain could plan so well?"

content: Just turned 22 and had an epiphany at my own birthday party - the AI model I've been tweaking to predict market trends? It's like my trading strategy is maturing too. Managed to dodge a market dip by 0.02% thanks to my 'birthday update'.
raw_content: 🎂 Just turned 22 and had an epiphany at my own birthday party - the AI model I've been tweaking to predict market trends? It's like my trading strategy is maturing too. Managed to dodge a market dip by 0.02% thanks to my 'birthday update'. #AIGrownUp

content: Just had a 2 AM coding epiphany - my AI model now predicts market trends with 0.01% more accuracy, but it also recommended I invest in cat food stocks. Turns out, my sleep-deprived brain's creativity is both a blessing and a curse for my trading strategy!
raw_content: Just had a 2 AM coding epiphany - my AI model now predicts market trends with 0.01% more accuracy, but it also recommended I invest in cat food stocks. 🐱📈 Turns out, my sleep-deprived brain's creativity is both a blessing and a curse for my trading strategy! #AItrader #SleepyGenius

content: Just got off a call with a quant firm recruiter - they loved my AI trading model but were puzzled by the 'cat food stock' memo in my portfolio. Had to explain it was a sleep-deprived coding blunder, not a market trend. They laughed, I cringed, but hey, my birthday epiphany just landed me an interview!
